section.title: Overview
section.content: This document outlines the requirements for building a modern e-commerce platform.

section.title: Customer Stories
section.content:
US-001: As a customer, I want to browse products so that I can find items to purchase.
Acceptance Criteria: - Product catalog displays correctly - Search functionality is responsive - Filtering options work properly - Product details are comprehensive
US-002: As a customer, I want to add items to my cart so that I can purchase multiple products.
Acceptance Criteria: - Items can be added to cart - Cart persists across sessions - Quantities can be modified - Items can be removed from cart

As a customer, I want add items to my cart so that I can purchase multiple products

section.title: Admin Stories
section.content: US-003: As an admin, I want to manage inventory so that product availability is accurate.

section.title: Functional Requirements
section.content: FR-001: The system must handle concurrent user sessions FR-002: Critical payment processing must be PCI compliant FR-003: Nice to have recommendation engine for related products

section.title: Overview
section.content: Microservices architecture for scalable e-commerce platform.

section.title: UserService
section.content:
Manages user accounts, authentication, and profiles.
Dependencies: - DatabaseService for persistence - EmailService for notifications

section.title: ProductService
section.content: Handles product catalog, inventory, and search functionality.

section.title: OrderService
section.content: Processes orders, payments, and fulfillment workflows.

section.title: DatabaseService
section.content: PostgreSQL-based data persistence layer with read replicas.

section.title: CacheService
section.content: Redis-based caching for improved performance.

section.title: Integration Points
section.content: - PaymentAPI: External payment processing - ShippingAPI: Third-party logistics integration - AnalyticsHandler: User behavior tracking
